## BammDeposit class

A Bamm Deposit and its accrued gains.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class BammDeposit 
```

## Remarks

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `BammDeposit` class.
